available_quests.title: Bounty: giant rats
available_quests.description: Grenda the Blacksmith is offering a bounty for slaying 4 giant rats sighted in the area around Riverside Village.

available_quests.title: Gather: raw meats
available_quests.description: Grenda the Blacksmith needs 12 raw meats. They believe wolfs in Whispering Woods may carry them.

objective.item_to_deliver_description: A package to be delivered to Grenda the Blacksmith. Seems to be from Talia the Merchant.

available_quests.title: Delivery: Sealed Package to Grenda the Blacksmith
available_quests.description: Talia the Merchant asks you to deliver a Sealed Package to Grenda the Blacksmith, who can be found in Riverside Village (Blacksmith's Forge).

available_quests.title: Gather: leather tunics
available_quests.description: Elder Thorne needs 2 leather tunics. They believe bandits in Whispering Woods may carry them.

objective.item_to_deliver_description: A package to be delivered to Barlin the Tavern Keeper. Seems to be from Elder Thorne.

available_quests.title: Delivery: Sealed Package to Barlin the Tavern Keeper
available_quests.description: Elder Thorne asks you to deliver a Sealed Package to Barlin the Tavern Keeper, who can be found in Riverside Village (The Drunken Dragon Tavern).
